description.value:
Class Skills: An oracle with the ascetic mystery adds Acrobatics (Dex), Climb (Str), Escape Artist (Dex), and Swim (Str) to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.879sdozw7ca7ci9k]{Stone Fist} (2nd),
